sub_category: RCC FOUNDATION FOR WOOD CHIPS STORAGE CONVEYOR
work_desc: CONSTRUCTION OF MASS RCC FOUNDATION FOR WOOD CHIPS STORAGE CONVEYOR BC NO.6 AND 7 AND CONCRETE FLOORING AT TNPL UNIT II UNDER MEP PHASE 1
pre_qualification:
The bidder shall be a reputed contractor of civil construction work and should meet the following qualification criteria

a  The bidder should have been awarded order and successfully completed atleast one Industrial type of construction having RCC structures and high raised heavy structures of minimum plus 8.00 mtr level in reputed concerns or Govt. organizations of value not less than Rs.700 lakh, against single order in the last five years.  The above value shall be inclusive of cost of all materials.  

b  The bidder should have executed atleast one number of Industrial building, involving high raised heavy RCC structures atleast upto plus 8.00 mtr level in a single order in the last Five years.  This criteria can be part of the work mentioned in qualification criteria No.A or any other independent work.

c   The bidder should have executed atleast one number of Industrial building, involving minimum 4,000 cu.m of concreting for the RCC high raised heavy structure against single order in the last Five years. This criteria can be part of the work mentioned in qualification criteria No.A, B or any other independent work.

d  The bidder should confirm mobilization of all necessary resources like concrete batch mixer, concrete pumps, shuttering and scaffolding materials etc., for mass volume concreting.

e  The period of Five years mentioned in the above qualification criteria No.A, B and C shall reckon from July, 2016.

f  The Average annual turnover of the bidder shall be not less than Rs.1,000 lakh in last three completed financial years 2017 to 18, 2018 to 19 and 2019 to 20.

The bidder is requested to submit Solvency Certificate from their Bank or Revenue department, not older than 12 months for Rs.140 lakh   Rupees One hundred and forty lakh only along with the Unpriced Techno Commercial Bid
